typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
source(output(
		MovieIdDupe as integer,
		ActionDupe as string,
		MovieId as integer,
		Title as string,
		Genre as string,
		Year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTom as integer,
		Action as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
moviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating
	)) ~> PruneCols1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Title,
		RottenTom
	)) ~> PruneCols2
PruneCols1, PruneCols2 join(soundex(PruneCols1@title) == soundex(PruneCols2@Title),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['fuzzylookup.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title = PruneCols1@title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTom
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
